website_summaries.verdict: While it could benefit from an on-unit display, its ability to play DVDs from any region right out of the box makes it a top choice for DVD collectors.
pros: Plays PAL and NTSC DVDs from any country, and multiple DVD or CD media types
No additional setup or codes needed
Slim profile and convenient remote control
cons: No on-unit display, so menu settings can only be viewed on the TV or monitor
Pause and resume controls can be confusing, as they’re not set up intuitively

customer_reviews.title: Really great HD DVD Player at a great price!.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a replacement for an elderly family friend who's player stop working. So first, I wanted a high quality player with HD up conversion. Many of my friend's DVD's are old and not HD. Tried one of them on this player and the picture quality was fantastic on her HD TV. Second I wanted a player that's not overly complicated and relatively easy to operate. My friend had no problems in operating her new player and now is a pro at it. And last and most important, my friend is extremely happy and playing all of her favorite DVDs
customer_reviews.author: Bu

customer_reviews.title: Plays fewer than half our DVDs
customer_reviews.text: Got this unboxed and installed pretty easily. Thought it was a little wonky that you had to turn it off for it to remember where on the DVD you were, but ok. All was OK until we put in the 2nd DVD, which wouldn't play at all. Wrong region apparently. Same thing happened with the next several DVDs...not cool. We had already thrown away the packaging so basically we now have a very expensive paperweight. Not impressed. At all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: System description is not accurate, it is generic cut and paste system information.
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. Shipping went well. However I am only giving three stars because the Amazon description said it would work with 115 and 220 volt systems and this information is wrong. It will only work with 115 volt AC. This was one of the main reasons I bought it, so I could use it in the UAE. To be an educated consumer we need accurate information, not cut and paste generic info.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after six months!
customer_reviews.text: It's not fancy, but it does what it says it does. Bought January 2018, will update if it stops working. Update: stopped working after six months of light use! Now it says that every DVD is not fomatted for this region. I didn't change any settings. Can't watch anything at all on it. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: shopper489

customer_reviews.title: Must press play/pause instead of stop for resume disc function to work
customer_reviews.text: I I thought the resume play was not working but just found out that if you press the play/ pause button instead of the stop button before you power down when you power off - then power the machine back on it will resume from where you left off - so please disregard my previous comment — who knew? I actually would’ve never figured this out if I had not read it in another person’s review . It had an HDMI port so it was easy to hook up. I had previously purchased a DVD from Malaysia which would not play in any of my other DVD players but it did play in this one .
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: It's a snap!
customer_reviews.text: Truly multi-region, multi-format DVD players are rare, and sometimes require "cheat" codes be entered for them to function around the world. This one plugged in and German, British, Japanese, Chinese, and other region, other format discs played as well as my many from the US. Clean picture & sound, wonderful detailed 1080p upconversion which looks beautiful on my 4K 60" TV. Plug and play at its easiest!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Adams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very good DVD player...my last one didn't want to play my dvds anymore so it was a relief to get this one! However, I changed my five star rating to a one-star because I discovered that this particular DVD player will not play movies if they are made by 20th Century Fox. The alerts that comes up says that this DVD cannot be played in this region. When reading the manual, it stated that DVDs in region 1 are the only ones that can be played. Apparently 20th Century Fox is a different region, whatever that means.
customer_reviews.author: Marie N

customer_reviews.title: Of course the reason is because I am not super tech savvy and it was not like my 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical about using only a hdmi cable. Of course the reason is because I am not super tech savvy and it was not like my 20 yr plus old one that died. But wow!, easy to hook up to the tv and the clarity is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hellman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This product is listed as a zone free DVD player. After arrival and problems with playing dvds,the statement on the back of the box says it will play only zone 2 dvd.s. This unit appears to be manufactured in Australia for playing zone 2 dvds. The advertisement on line states it is supposed to be a zone free dvde player. The dvd I tried to play was brand new and ordered from Amazon. This unit would not play it. The message it shows is that it was an incorrect zone. I am immediately returning this and will never use that seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Long in the Tooth

customer_reviews.title: Only Plays European Region #2 DVDs.  Not USA DVDs!
customer_reviews.text: Title indicates "Multi Region" & "Region Free". But one I received has Region #2, (Europe) stamped on back. For USA Region DVDs, screen indicates, "Incorrect Region". Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: srbrew2

customer_reviews.title: VERY SLOW
customer_reviews.text: I have had several CD/DVD players over the years and this has got to be the worst. The time to get a response after pressing a button is very long- many seconds, maybe even a whole minute. Meanwhile, you wonder if you really pressed it hard enough, but pressing it again doesn't make it go faster. Most are auto-play, now. Not this one. So, best to put the DVD in, then press play, then go make the popcorn. It should be about ready to start when you return.
customer_reviews.author: SongBird

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic dvd player i have a lots of european format ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic dvd player i have a lots of european format dvd's and this player really plays all. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Radka Pietrass

customer_reviews.title: Many problems, look at other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Could not give it zero stars. Within a few weeks of purchase (April 2019) it began to freeze, spontaneously revert to the home screen, or go black. Only way to continue was to remove and replace power. Since the warranty is a pass through, it is necessary to deal with Sony which denies the many problems with this model. Sony will not refund (or offer a credit toward a different model), but insists on a replacement unit which apparently has same design flaws. Almost not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player works great. I have played region 1 and 2 dvd's and it has performed perfectly. The only thing I wish it did was to turn off automatically when it finished playing a dvd. This is my second Panasonic dvd player. The first one I purchased from Amazon back in 2012 and it still works great. I do not have cable so I use it every day to watch movies. I also sell a lot of dvd's on E-Bay and I test every one of them on this machine. It's had a lot of use. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rayner

customer_reviews.title: I'll be returning this product
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the weather clears, I'll be returning this product. It was advertised as playing DVD's from all regions. It apparently, does not. I continue to get error messages indicating that some discs will not play. I didn't purchase to play "some discs", I purchased it to play ALL discs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Authier

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.  DVD Player can play PAL DVD video content and output to NTSC TV (US).
customer_reviews.text: Solved my problem for playing successfully an All Region DVD with PAL video format on a regular US TV (NTSC). Old DVD Player gives an error message when DVD was loaded: "cannot read". I trusted this unit from reading the description since it explicitly stated: "It will change the video signal of a (sic) PAL contents and output it to NTSC format." (Perhaps other DVD PAL-NTSC players do the same conversion however this was the only unit that clearly stated how it does it.) This DVD Player can also play my US region 1 DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: SW In Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 12 Stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Who would have believed? The player arrived and after spending 8 minutes connecting it to my television, I began watching all my favorite DVDs which I brought from Germany . Simply plug it in and turn it on. No need for menu settings or region selection. Best of all – the picture quality is excellent! In fact this player has allowed me to purchase quite a few excellent DVDs from Amazon.de (Germany) Amazon.DE instantly recognized my account and I am able to take advantage of Prime with no or minimal shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Man

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a multi-region dvd player. I tested out US and UK dvd's, and had no problems. I bought an HDMI cable separately, so the picture quality is good. Remote control came with a set of batteries to insert. The plug had 2 pins for Europe, & came with a US adapter. It lacks something important, which is a digital tracker on the front face of the dvd player, to tell you how far you're into the dvd. If you're going to finish watching a dvd at a future time, then you should know at what minute you should resume.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Plays European DVDs no problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to play a DVD series produced in England. Since some of the reviewers stated that they had difficulty playing non-US DVDs, I was somewhat apprehensive. I had no problem at all. It has a 110 volt plug so it plugs right into a US outlet. I plugged the HDMI cable (not included) into my receiver and inserted a DVD. It played perfectly. For the cost, if there are international DVDs that you want to play, the cost is low enough to make this well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding support from Bombay Electronics
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these Panasonic S700EP-K Multi Region 1080p Up-Conversion Code Region Free DVD/CD players from Bombay Electroncs, one a year earlier than the other. Due to house moving the first one didn't get unboxed for a year. When I plugged it in it had issues with playing region 1 DVDs. When I reached out to Bombay Electronics about the issue they immediately sent out a replacement unit and a return shipping label with no fuss. The replacement worked perfectly. I highly recommend that if you need a region free player that you consider purchasing from Bombay Electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Greenwood Family

customer_reviews.title: Works as described but likely not approved for US sale
customer_reviews.text: This product is likely not supposed to be sold in the US. This is an Eastern Europe product. Because of that Panasonic will likely not honor the warranty. This is a minor inconvenience based on the price of the product. I had limited time to test the product but the Region 2 DVD's I tried worked without problem. The player does not have any of the stickers mentioned by other reviewers (such as Region x only) so it is likely that different products can be delivered to different customers. Some suppliers overcharge for region free players. This one seems to work for a reasonable price. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Received this today, and my son kindly set it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this today, and my son kindly set it up for me. (It would have taken me days!) It played my UK DVD of "The Catholics" perfectly. He noted that the DVD holder is flimsy, and I told him reviewers had mentioned this and advised not to let children insert DVDs. I have ordered "Tudor Monastery Farm," which is also in UK format and look forward to enjoying it on my TV screen. If the player fails, I will amend my review.
customer_reviews.author: olderandwiser

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! So I bought Two!
customer_reviews.text: This plays DVDs from all over the world which is awesome since I collected them from all over when I was in the travel industry. Picture quality is true HD and the unit itself has a low learning curve so it is easy to use right out of the box. I bought two of them for different rooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyT

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. Product works well. Easy plug & play set up. Nice to be able to watch region 2 dvds that haven’t been released for region 1. Opens up a bigger selection.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: Works well with American-formatted DVDs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely to use for BRITISH DVDs. I havent been able to try playing British formatted DVDs, as the ones I ordered are lost in transit. It did OK with American formatted DVDs, though. Picture quality could be a bit sharper, but for the price, I am satisfied.Will update this review if my order of UK DVDs arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Thanks. Recommend to buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Bless Amazon for sending me this universal player that plays all my US , CANADIAN , and ALL international Dvds. I wish to congratulate Amazon for selling this product that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't play European DVDs...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it didn't play any of our European DVDs, so we had to send it back...
customer_reviews.author: Julia Q

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This - You Won't Get What You Order
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Panasonic DVD player specifically to play Region 2 videos. I didn't get to play anything on this multi-region DVD play as they sent the wrong power converter with it. Unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: ldramjet

customer_reviews.title: DVD player works well and is a bargain
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player covers other regions as expected. I experienced popping, jaggies and loud noises while playing one DVD (north amerircan region) which did not occur when played on another DVD player. I'm not sure why this happened; there were no visible defects on the DVD.
customer_reviews.author: M. Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Region 2 (UK) DVD’s
customer_reviews.text: Superb unit! It arrived very quickly and I plugged it into the wall socket, used an HDMI cable to connect it to my television and that was it. This unit (S700EP-K) plays my Region 2 DVD’s from the UK perfectly with no issues at all. Highly recommended. I’ve always liked Panasonic quality and this unit measures up.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Quick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: returned did not work and it was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: Improper monitor control!
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player does not properly or optimally resize the output for a given wide-aspect ratio/resolution of a monitor. On the same monitor I had two different players (e.g. Sony), both were able to provide options to maximize the viewing space. This one produce huge black space despite the exact aspect ratio of the input video. As a result I am seeing the same movies I have seen 100s of times now smaller..
customer_reviews.author: Kosi Gramatikoff

customer_reviews.title: It broke after a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine at first, but just randomly stopped turning on after about a year and a half. We used it very little, it did not undergo any trauma. It just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: Was not as described. This DVD player is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not as described. This DVD player is not Region Free. This DVD player only plays DVDs from Region 1 which is North and south America.
customer_reviews.author: Carla H.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: After replacing my old 3x larger PAL DVD/HDMI player with this new, much smaller and easy to use Panasonic machine I was surprised how much the technology has improved. No more travelling through the numerous menus and still wondering, whether this will work or not? Very good machine, thank you Panasonic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. It's good for watching my Kill la Kill DVDs but, however, it's won't play my other DVDs (which aren't PAL), so I may have to purchase another DVD player or use this one and the old one simultaneously depending on what DVDs I feel like watching. Nowhere did the description indicate that it will not play ▶ Region 1 DVDs but it works well for a secondhand one.
customer_reviews.author: Amoridere

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Took about 5 minutes. Picture quality fantastic!!! Easy to use remote.
customer_reviews.author: Lisann948

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! DVD player arrived in perfect condition. As stated in the speaker's description this unit plays my DVDs from other countries as well as those from this country without a problem. The picture and sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Well built and performs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to play our UK region DVD's or any region for that matter. We carry this Playing in our RV so I can also say that it is well built and is able to take some bumping around.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item, but had no trouble returning it, getting a refund, and re-ordering this player.....all in 1 week! I tried this player on 2 PAL encoded DVDs that would not play on my other players. Success! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: William Hawkson

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We have played both PAL and NTSC DVDs with great results. Our set of All creatures Great and Small had numerous problems with our 11 year old Pioneer multi region player. This Unit plays those disks perfectly. I guess it was time to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: G. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved
customer_reviews.text: This is a reasonably priced, easy to use machine that solves the problem of viewing DVD's from different regions. You just put the DVD in the machine and the machine chooses the correct mode. I had no set-up issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Working Well for Me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this exclusively to watch "The Search For The Nile", region 2 DVD, from Germany, also available from Amazon. I had a bit of difficulty at first getting the english audio to play, but this was due to my lack of familiarity with the disc menu as well as the players controls. I've searched for decades in an effort to find this on DVD and I'm delighted with both the player and the Discs..
customer_reviews.author: A. Cowart

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mainly play cd's, what a mistake. The tracks that are connected have a small delay between them & this should NOT be. If I would have known this I would've bought a cd player. It also kept skipping or blanking out here & there, like it just stopped playing. The dvd player I had before did not do that & I had it since 2007 up to 2020. I also paid $35 for it, it was a MAGNAVOX. This one was a waste of time & money.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo Alien

customer_reviews.title: Many flaws - do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: 1) does not play continuous CD tracks correctly- inserts an annoying gap between tracks and no way to fix this 2) when using the zoom option on dvd cannot remove zoom label from screen so feature is useless You get what you pay for and this is cheap rubbish!
customer_reviews.author: Mean Machine

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a minute, with DVD stuck inside.
customer_reviews.text: Had to take it apart to retrieve the disc; I would not put anything into this device if you expect to get it back.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: A tiny addition
customer_reviews.text: This player works well with everything although DVDs burned by me tend to skip and lose audio. Commercial films appear to play perfectly. This player, like others now, is very small and flimsy but the older DVD recorder I was using has a lot more inside it.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Osterholm

customer_reviews.title: Audio goes off for a second or two now and then...Can be annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The major issue with this player is that the audio goes off for a second or two now and again. With some DVD's it may only happen once or twice but with others it is more frequent and intermittent. The DVD's I am playing have worked fine on my previous DVD player and are not old DVD's. It seems to happen less when watching movies and more often with exercise videos or instructional type video.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, easy to set up and works great...........
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, worked fine right out of the box - easy hookup, just the HDMI and power cables, that was it. I ran both an American Region 1 movie and a European Region 2 flick thru it, both ran fine.
customer_reviews.author: whooziss

customer_reviews.title: Plays DVDs from China, Hong Kong and Thailand
customer_reviews.text: I used to live in China and travel all over Southeast Asia, so my DVD collection has movies from the US, Thailand, Hong Kong and mainland China. Everything I've put in this player so far as worked superbly, except for really old DVDs that were scratched and not working well before. The box says that it's only Region 1 (printed on the box), but there is a sticker applied that says "Region Free". So far, my non-US DVDs have played, so I'm happy with the purchase. Will update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Where has Panasonic quality gone?
customer_reviews.text: I was a video engineer in the 80's and 90's, and back then Panasonic built the best home video players and recorders (though some will argue that JVC was better, but they were both excellent products). What's happened since then??? I bought this S700P-K to replace my 14-year-old JVC DVD player because the JVC doesn't support some newer formats of recordable discs. This Panasonic feels cheap, like electronics sold by drug stores, and when it operates it sounds cheaper. Picture was great ... when it played, but it randomly pauses and skips on discs that play just fine on my ancient JVC. Returning the unit and will probably try a Sony.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Panasonic player works well as expected. The only drawback is no memory of last play.
customer_reviews.author: rasantos

customer_reviews.title: Good performance except it subtitles automatically
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly reasonable player. For some mysterious reason, though, it always sets subtitles to ON. We have to shut them off for every DVD.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I could not make this DVD player work. The instructions were not at all clear and there was no phone number to call for help. I would not recommend this product to anyone over the age of 40. We just aren’t savvy enough with electronics
customer_reviews.author: The reader

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for All Region DVDs
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's working very well. Had a Samsung which was noisy and broke down after six months. Then purchased a Sony, and it was defective out of the box. I'll stick with this brand and model. Easy to b setup and use, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Minnewegian

customer_reviews.title: dO NOT BUY THIS ****
customer_reviews.text: it came with a chinese plug and a loose US adaptor. it is slow and control is super low end
customer_reviews.author: evil rice

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not exactly as represented.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this DVD player. However, does not play MP4, MKV, or some avi files on thumb drive. It says on the box that it is NOT an all region player.
customer_reviews.author: starmoth

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: thought it was going to be good - but after only 2 dvd - the unit started 'no disc' and you could not hear it engage to run the dvd.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Moses

customer_reviews.title: THis dvd all region player was sooo easy to hook up - like 10 seconds and I ...
customer_reviews.text: THis dvd all region player was sooo easy to hook up - like 10 seconds and I can play dvds from other countries. I bought two of them one as a gift. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Attention to Detail

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: There were a few reviews about this product that I don't understand. One said there is no HDMI connection... no, there is no HDMI cable included. Another said there were no play/pause/stop/ FFW buttons on the remote... They are on the remote I have? For the price this is a great DVD player. I've had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Roby

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch, again
customer_reviews.text: The box has an added sticker that reads “region free” however the printed info on the box reveals it is a region 2 model
customer_reviews.author: Arly

customer_reviews.title: Defective. We had to send it right back because it didn’t work out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product but it was defective right out of the box. Panasonic used to be a great brand for this media but I guess times have changed. Absolutely NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jraptor

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined remote control is useless
customer_reviews.text: The stylish remote control looks slick and modern, but it lacks number keys or buttons. It makes me rely on voice command. But the voice command is inadequate to perform many functions. Fortunately, I am renting a different remote from Comcast, which allows me to get full use of the TV set. Is there a Users' Manual for the remote control?
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: NICE UNIT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... put in DVDs that wouldn't play in old machine and they now work just fine ... took about ten minutes to set up ... very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of setup and operation of the unit
customer_reviews.text: It is probably too early to give a complete review. I love the ease of setup and operation of the unit. It would not play one of my own DVDs and stated it was an unsupported format. I guess that I must get more familiar with my conversion software to find the correct format. Will update this as I gain more experience with the product. As to simple library borrowed movies it does a beautiful job. Longevity and durability? Too early to tell and will update later. It will be used to play in nursing homes to play music for shut-in seniors so durability is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky J Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Small and sleek - better then the ones we had in the past. Pricey - but you get what you pay for with DVD players. Works on all our CD's. Remote works well and is intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: It's a game of chance when inserting a dvd. Some DVDs simply will not play, giving a "wrong region" error. No rhyme or reason related to the DVDs age or condition. Brand new DVDs won't play, or they will..same with older DVDs. This machine plays probably 60% of the DVDs I've tried, at best. Because I don't use it terribly often, I didn't discover the problem until months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great DVD player and I've used it a fair amount ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great DVD player and I've used it a fair amount in the months since I purchased it. Extremely easy to hook up which surprised and delighted me. Takes up very minimal space. My only regret is that there is no counter on the face of the player so you have no idea where you are in the movie as to length, but I guess you can't have everything in a machine at such a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, space saver
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this DVD machine. It's lightweight, compact, and a space saver. The DVDs are clear and the picture surprisingly good. However, I am disappointed that I can no longer use the surround sound speaker set that I could with my former machine--one I had for the past 10 years..
customer_reviews.author: DBM

customer_reviews.title: Optical drive stopped working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Optical drive stopped working after 4 months. Amazon warranty had expired and it was too costly to return to the vendor for parts only warranty. Pay your money and take your chances
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: UK model?!
customer_reviews.text: The one I got is a UK model, which would require a voltage converter. 🤔 Also says Region 2 on the back. No idea if it plays anything else. Throwing away.
customer_reviews.author: My Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for the money. Positive review from New Hampshire
customer_reviews.text: This DVD Player is great. I can play all my DVDs purchased in Germany. Pictures quality is perfect. Came with an adapter to use in American power outlets. Definitely would purchase from this Seller in the future. Received item in less than a week!! A++++
customer_reviews.author: Deutschland Boy

customer_reviews.title: Multi-region DVD Player!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second multi-region DVD players. Wanted a second one for my bedroom TV. It is a wonderful product which allows you to enjoy DVDs from other countries as well as ours. It arrived prompted and is in perfect condition. Now to watch my UK and Australian DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Fannin

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the price and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the price and ease of use. However, out of the box, the dvds kept skipping. You can get a blue ray player for $5 less and better return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Podczaszy

customer_reviews.title: Very Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a multi-zone Panasonic because I thought it would provide the same quality service as a multi-zone Panasonic player that I purchased several years ago I was sadly mistaken. Many of the blue ray and DVD disks that play in my my older Panasonic will not play ("disk error") on this device. It was a waste of money. I would return it; however, I do not have the original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Love this DVD player! I'm a huge fan of BBC shows, some of which aren't made for region 1 DVD players, and this one is a good quality player at a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: easy set up good picture quality on my 55in Sanyo
customer_reviews.text: Received Thursday. Protective packaging, easy set up good picture quality on my 55in Sanyo. I use my gold hdmi cord, not the red,yellow, white cord it comes with. Easy set up. Bought this because I bought a Lion King 3 dvd pack from Spain. 4 stars cause it's only been a few days. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Definitely won’t play all regions
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but will not play all Dvds! So far I have two dvd sets that it says “will not play format for this region”. One I remember is region 1. The other was Season 6 of Lost purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture Quality, Cheaply Made, Developed Playback Problem in less than 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Picture Quality was good, but often times required pressing front panel buttons twice to get them to respond. I liked the older Panasonic DVD players better as they were of better quality, gray rather than black in color, and not so cheaply made. And regarding quality, this one developed playback problems less than six months after purchase. Since Panasonic quality seems to have slipped in recent years, I probably won't buy another Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: LC in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: and just boring..
customer_reviews.text: Should have got one of these ages ago..plays all regions, so we have not been as limited in movie choices. Most movies made in US are too contrived, too ridiculously unintelligent, and just boring...this opens up other worlds of possibility. The remote is too small, buttons for functions hard to read..
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix77

customer_reviews.title: Good. solid product
customer_reviews.text: Does everything as advertised. Wish it remembered where you stopped viewing, but I guess you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: RMS 101

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this, it was VERY easy to hook it up and was a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: JudyR

customer_reviews.title: Plays fine.
customer_reviews.text: Plays fine. Great to have a multi region player. Only thing missing is that it doesn't show time remaining on the disc. But at this price point it's still a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player developed a fault after less than 12 months, intermittent sound interruption and sound out of sync with visual. I would expect a DVD player of this quality should play properly for a lot longer than 11 months. So far no response to my message from vendor
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Will not play all of my DVDs
customer_reviews.text: I got this in today. I am really disappointed it does not play any of my other region DVDs
customer_reviews.author: Amber Henney

customer_reviews.title: NOISY LOUD hum, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Noisy, very noisy, extremely noisy. It rumbles like a rocket. Awful loud and noisy. And it's 7 days past the return window. Do not buy this dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryIsAwesome

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I just plug it in and it works perfectly. I'm using it to play polish movies. Very happy with my product. Jesli mieszkasz w USA i szukasz dvd player ktory bedzie odtwarzal polskie filmy polecam ten produkt. Nie trzeba niczego specjalnie kodowac lub rozkodowywac po prostu podlaczasz do pradu i juz gotowe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena M. Miga

customer_reviews.title: Plays any DVD plus PAL !! Who needs Blu-Ray
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had two and it’s an excellent player. It will play anything from any country!! Great PAL player also your new and old DVD’s!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry J. Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: The machine is simple and easy to use. However to have color you need to use the HDMI connection. The regular cables don't work well and the picture is grainy and only B&W. Also, the instructions say it plays Region 1 and Region "All" and it did play my DVD from Region 2.
customer_reviews.author: DTT

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player
customer_reviews.text: I know I am in the minorty, but I like to workout to m Yoga CD's for my back and this units is a great player, which integrates with TV easily and I can enjoy my exercixe in peace,,, thank you Panasonic for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Annie K  Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Works wonderful. Plays all regions of dvd. Great. Clear. Just plugged in and connected to tv with hdmi cable. DOES NOT PLAY BLU-RAY. But that is fine. Only had a couple of those so no big deal!
customer_reviews.author: CAHuss

customer_reviews.title: Waist moneys
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t support any regions like describe very bad waist moneys
customer_reviews.author: Alek

customer_reviews.title: Did not last two years with regular use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this player because I wanted to be able to view dvds from any region. It does and works well for the most part. But it did not last long; I bought it in November 2016 and it didn't quite make it though August 2018.
customer_reviews.author: InTheBerkshires

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product does not play all dvd discs. I believe it is not actually a DVD player for all country regions as specified. I did not discover this problem until it was too late to return otherwise I would have. Normally Panasonic is very reliable but in this case they are either flawed or not as advertised
customer_reviews.author: meandon

customer_reviews.title: Great playback - Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of DVDs from Amazon UK and this is the second universal format player that I've purchased from Amazon. Works great with all formats, has great picture quality and is simple to use. Nice if it also had streaming, but still very good as is.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: It gets it done
customer_reviews.text: I plugged the Panasonic S700P-K Multi-Region Player into my system and it plays all my DVDs. Have not tested other features yet. My old Samsung DVD Player started to not play certain DVDs and it was cheaper to replace than fix. I chose to go with Panasonic this time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Miles

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding DVD player !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own and have owned many multi region DVD players but this is the diamond of them all!!!! and it plays great ,it’s a incredible price I will buy it again!!!!!Thanks a million. Steve. As a matter of fact I’m going to buy two more!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't do like it said it would and I wasn't happy returned it for a Samsung love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Dunnigan

customer_reviews.title: The device is working fine. It's timer will turn off the machine for ...
customer_reviews.text: The device is working fine. It's timer will turn off the machine for a "lengthy" pause, and the machine is able to resume the play again when turned back on. Video quality is good, The only concern is that when it resumes, the machine generates some quacking sound probably due to its searching effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: It is better than most but not quite as good as the older Panasonic that existed 15 years ago. It does play multi regions 0-8 and automatically converts PAL to NTSC.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

product_meta.title: Panasonic S700EP-K Multi Region 1080p Up-Conversion Code Region Free DVD/CD player, Xvid, USB Playback and photo slideshow with MP3 Music
feature_bullets: This DVD Player will play PAL and NTSC DVDs from Any Country and this player works with any TV worldwide
1080p Up-Conversion/ 108MHz/12bit DAC/ Dust Proof Design/ Power Resume/ Xvid Compatible/ USB/ Black Finish
Playable Disc: DVD-R*/DVD-R DL*/DVD-RW*, +R*/ +R DL*/ +RW*, MP3, JPEG,CD, CD-R/-RW, Xvid, SVCD,
Power resume DVD even after a power failure, CD ripping, Multi-format playback
It will change the video signal of a PAL contents and output it to NTSC format

Audio output: Output level: 2 Vrms (1 kHz, 0 dB) Output connector: Pin jack (1 System) Number of connectors: 2 channel , Video output: Output level: 1.0 Vp-p (75 ohms ) Output connector: Pin jack (1 System)
